results.name: default/wordpress-deployment-7c897b69b5-x2zjh

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-deployment-7c897b69b5-x2zjh], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints because the specified pod is not running as expected.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs Pod/wordpress-deployment-7c897b69b5-x2zjh`.
3. Ensure pod readiness probes are correctly configured.
4. Restart pod if necessary.
